info.title: Basketball - CBK
info.description: The API calls below can be used to test the Input and Output of our API endpoints.  You'll need an API key and an assigned secret to access the live data and so if you haven't contacted us yet, now is the time!  Our sales staff would be happy to set you up with trial access so you can begin to evaluate the product. CBK - College Basketball

externalDocs.description: After you've been given an API key and secret, enter it below and "Get" the method you'd like to try out.  Fill in the parameters with what you'd like to try, or use the built in defaults, and click "Try It!" to execute the call.  The JSON or XML response will be populated in the Response Body, the Response Body will provide you with any relevant codes, and the Request Header URI will show you how the call would be made within your application. Please note:Also, endpoints almost always require a final "/".  You will receive "596 Service Not Found" when it is missing.  An exception to this is for optional methods, such as eventId or teamId.

tags.name: CBK - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, shot charts

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: A teamId returns information for that team only.  If entered, then the conferenceId is ignored.

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: A conferenceId returns teams in the selected conference.

parameters.name: collegeSubDivisionId
parameters.description: Entering a collegeSubDivisionId will return only the teams in that division

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description:
Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, play-by-play, and shot charts.  The box, pbp, & shotChart parameters are only available when a single game is selected.
 Simple schedules are also available via the events endpoint.
tags: CBK - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, shot charts

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp, and shotCharts parameters.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: pbp
parameters.description:
Returns the play-by-play for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'pbp=true'.
  Default - pbp data will not be returned

parameters.name: shotCharts
parameters.description:
Returns the shot charts for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'shotCharts=true'.
  Default - shot chart data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: A conferenceId returns teams in the selected conference.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get scores for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like CBK 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: top25PollId
parameters.description: If used, will return only games involving top 25 teams for the selected pollId. Only applicable for a single day's games, and therefore must be used in conjunction with the &date paramenter, or the default (current day) call.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All games (reg/post combined)

parameters.name: tournamentId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games for this tournament.
  Default - All games (reg/post combined)

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player names, team names, and venues. Not all languages available for every name.
 For languageId = 2 only (Spanish), PBP text will also be translated.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description: Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, play-by-play, and shot charts. However box scores, play-by-play, and shot charts are available for a single game only, and so cannot be accessed here when all events for a single team are returned. This endpoint should be used for team schedules & scores only.
tags: CBK - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, shot charts

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Provide a teamId when you want information for just that team. 'box', 'pbp', and 'shotCharts' parameters are not allowed because you are requesting schedule information for a team, not an individual event.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get scores for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like CBK 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: top25PollId
parameters.description: If used, will return only games involving top 25 teams for the selected pollId. Only applicable for a single day's games, and therefore must be used in conjunction with the &date paramenter, or the default (current day) call.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All games (reg/post combined)

parameters.name: tournamentId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games for this tournament.
  Default - Regular Season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player names, team names, and venues. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and bo...
get.description: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and box score information for CBK events.  (Play-by-play & Shot Charts are not available in the box endpoint.)
tags: CBK - Schedules, scores, box scores, play-by-play, shot charts

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box request.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: A conferenceId returns teams in the selected conference.

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get scores for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like CBK 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: top25PollId
parameters.description: If used, will return only games involving top 25 teams for the selected pollId. Only applicable for a single day's games, and therefore must be used in conjunction with the &date paramenter, or the default (current day) call.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All games (reg/post combined)

parameters.name: tournamentId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games for this tournament.
  Default - Regular Season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player names, team names, and venues. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The standings endpoint will provide the league sta...
get.description: The standings endpoint will provide the league standings, including all team data relevant to standings.

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description:
Expanded includes additional data points for each team.
 Default - false

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: A conferenceId returns teams in the selected conference.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get standings for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
 Default - json

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description:
Expanded includes additional data points for each team.
 Default - false

To get standings for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.

Preferred response type.
 Default - json

get.summary: The participants endpoint provides biographical in...
get.description: The participants endpoint provides biographical information for players and can be used to return information on a single player, a single teams roster, all teams rosters within the league, or all free agents.

parameters.name: sinceYearLast
parameters.description:
Anyone who last played since the requested year.  Enter year as YYYY.
  Default - If no year selected, will return current rosters.

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player & team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Historical rosters provide biographical informatio...
get.description: Historical rosters provide biographical information for players that played for a team in a single specified season.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Provide team ID to return roster for one team.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like CBK 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player & team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: College Basketball polls

parameters.name: pollId
parameters.description:
The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.
 Default - Associated Press

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get polls for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like CBK 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: pollDate
parameters.description:
Returns the most recent poll less than or equal to the date entered.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - the most recent poll

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

 Note: Seasons that span years like CBK 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.

get.summary: CBK - Season stats for a single player

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Statistics for games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - All games (reg/post combined)

parameters.name: enc
parameters.description:
The 'encyclopedia returns full career and season-by-season totals.
 Notes:
  The encyclopedia is valid for a single player only.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: careerOnly
parameters.description: For a single player's career stats, only to be used in conjunction with 'enc=true'

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & player names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CBK - Player splits (breakdowns).

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: splitId
parameters.description:
Enter the stat split to be returned. (The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.)
  1. If omitted, only official total stats (splitId = -1) will be returned. 
  2. If 'all', all the splits are returned.
  3. Otherwise, the entered split is returned.
  Default - Official totals (splitId = -1)

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Statistics for games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - All games (reg/post combined)

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & player names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CBK - Leaders

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns Minutes).

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

parameters.name: nonQualifiers
parameters.description:
Should non-qualifiers be returned?
  Default - false

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description:
To return 'worst' players (trailers) rather than 'best' players (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Traliers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: A conferenceId returns teams in the selected conference.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Leaders among games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - All games (reg/post combined)

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CBK - Team Leaders

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns Points per Game).

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties).

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description:
To return 'worst' teams (trailers) rather than 'best' teams (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Traliers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description: A conferenceId returns teams in the selected conference.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Leaders among games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - All games (reg/post combined)

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NFL 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CBK - Daily Leaders

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.
  Default - Blank (returns points).

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Leaders in games played on specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description:
Leaders among specified conference only. See conferences decode endpoint.
  Default - all conferences

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Leaders among games in the specified eventType only. See eventTypes decode endpoint.
  Default - Regular Season

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Leaders among games in the specified eventRound only. See eventRounds decode endpoint.
  Default - all rounds combined

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player & team names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CBK - Coaches

parameters.name: coachId
parameters.description:
To get results for single coach, enter coach ID.
  Default - If no ID is entered, all current CBK coaches will be returned.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CBK - Coaches for a single team

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Enter team ID to return information active coaches for one team. Example: 1547 - Northwestern. See /teams endpoint for list of all team IDs

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CBK - Odds

parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like CBK 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
 Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
For team names/nicknames/abbreviations only. Select ID to change language of team names. Not all languages available for every name/nickname/abbreviation.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: CBK - Decodes

parameters.name: decodeType
parameters.description: The data type to be decoded.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
For seasonStructure only. To get structure for a single season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: allSeasons
parameters.description:
For seasonStructure only. To get complete history of league, select allSeasons=TRUE. Only those permissioned for all historic data will be able to utilize the 'allSeasons' option.
  Default - false

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
For venues only. Select ID to change language of venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description: Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of optical game data including live scores, box scores, play-by-play, shot/pass/touch/possession breakdowns, and more. An eventId is always required for optical event endpoints.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The Id for the requested event.  Mandatory when requesting optical event data regardless of parameters used.

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for the given event.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: fitness
parameters.description:
Returns fitness analytic information, broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default - false, fitness data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: matchupStats
parameters.description:
Returns matchup details (offensive stats and defensive results against opposing players), broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default false, matchup stats will not be returned

parameters.name: pbp
parameters.description:
Returns the play-by-play for a specific in-progress or concluded event.
  Default - pbp data will not be returned

parameters.name: passBreakdown
parameters.description:
Returns passing statistics, broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default - false, pass breakdown stats will not be returned

parameters.name: possessionBreakdownId
parameters.description:
Provides statistics on different aspects of a team's possessions. More in-depth than 'possessions'. 
  Default - Unused, no possession breakdown data will be returned

parameters.name: possessions
parameters.description:
Enumerates the possessions for the given event and also provides specific stats related to the possession.
  Default - false, possession data will not be returned

parameters.name: reboundLog
parameters.description:
Returns rebound enumeration and statistics, broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default - false, rebound statistics will not be returned

parameters.name: screenStats
parameters.description:
Returns pick-and-roll (pnr) stats, broken down by both players and teams, for the given event. 
  Default - false, pick-and-roll statistics will not be returned

parameters.name: sequence
parameters.description:
Provides player coordinate location data (X,Y,Z) based on PBP sequence time. 
  Default - false, coordinate data for PBP sequences will not be returned

parameters.name: shotBreakdownId
parameters.description:
Provides statistics on different aspects of a team's player's shots. More in-depth than 'shotLog'. 
  Default - Unused, no shot breakdown data will be returned

parameters.name: shotLog
parameters.description:
Returns shot enumeration and statistics, broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default - false, shot statistics will not be returned

parameters.name: statCoordinateTypeId
parameters.description:
Returns comma-delimited stat coordinate strings, broken down by player, describing where a particular stat occurred. 
  Default - Unused, stat coordinate data will not be returned

parameters.name: touchBreakdownId
parameters.description:
Returns various touch-related statistics, broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default - Unused, no touch breakdown statistics will be returned

parameters.name: touchStatTypeId
parameters.description:
Provides shot result statistics based on different touch locations in the offensive zone, broken down by both players and teams, for the given event. 
  Default - Unused, no shot result touch location data will be returned

get.summary: Access to this stats endpoint will provide you wit...
get.description: Access to this stats endpoint will provide you with the highest level of optical player stats data including distance run, average speed, touches, passes, assists, rebounds, and fouls. A playerId is always required when requesting this endpoint.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: The unique Id of the player you're requesting optical stats for.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Statistics for games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - Regular Season

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Filters results to only include optical player stats from this team in the given event. 
 Default - Unused, no team filtering will occur.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Filters results to only include the given year. 
 Default - the current active year will be returned.

parameters.name: statsFrom
parameters.description:
This parameter allows you to further breakdown optical player stats by season totals (FULL), season totals by all team stints (ALL), and season totals for one or more stints on the same team (TEAM). Please note: the statsFrom=TEAM value also requires you to supply the 'teamId' parameter with a value. 
  Default - FULL, season totals will be returned.

parameters.name: defenseStats
parameters.description:
Returns analytic information for a player regarding times when they were defending another player. 
  Default - false, defense stats will not be returned.

parameters.name: fitness
parameters.description:
Returns fitness analytic information for the given player. 
  Default - false, fitness data will not be returned

parameters.name: matchupStats
parameters.description:
Returns defensive analytic information for the given player VS all the players they've been matched up with to date. 
  Default false, matchup stats information will not be returned.

parameters.name: passBreakdown
parameters.description:
Returns passing statistics for the given player. 
  Default - false, pass breakdown stats will not be returned

parameters.name: shotBreakdownId
parameters.description:
Provides statistics on different aspects of a team's player's shots. More in-depth than 'shotLog'. 
  Default - Unused, no shot breakdown data will be returned

parameters.name: touchBreakdownId
parameters.description:
Returns various touch-related statistics for the given player. 
  Default - Unused, no touch breakdown statistics will be returned

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this stats endpoint will provide you wit...
get.description: Access to this stats endpoint will provide you with the highest level of optical player stats data for a single player from a specific event including distance run, average speed, touches, passes, assists, rebounds, and fouls. A playerId is always required when requesting this endpoint.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: The unique Id of the player you're requesting optical stats for. A playerId is always required when requesting this endpoint.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The unique Id of the event you're requesting optical player stats for (optional). If an eventId is not provided then the 'season' parameter must be included with a year value.

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Filters results to only include optical player stats from this eventRound. This parameter is only applicable for events with an eventType of 'Postseason' (2). 
  Default - all rounds

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Statistics for games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - Regular Season

parameters.name: splitId
parameters.description:
Enter the stat split to be returned. (The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.)
  1. If omitted, only official total stats (splitId = -1) will be returned.
  2. If 'all', all the splits are returned.
  3. Otherwise, the entered split is returned.
  Default - Official totals (splitId = -1)

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Filters results to only include optical player stats from this team in the given event. 
 Default - Unused, no team filtering will occur.

parameters.name: fitness
parameters.description:
Returns fitness analytic information for the given player. 
  Default - false, fitness data will not be returned

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player names, team names, and venues. Not all languages available for every name. 
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this stats endpoint will provide you wit...
get.description: Access to this stats endpoint will provide you with the highest level of optical player stats data for a single player from a all events for the given season including distance run, average speed, touches, passes, assists, rebounds, and fouls. A playerId is always required when requesting this endpoint.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: The unique Id of the player you're requesting optical stats for. A playerId is always required when requesting this endpoint.

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Filters results to only include optical player stats from this eventRound. This parameter is only applicable for events with an eventType of 'Postseason' (2). 
  Default - all rounds

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Statistics for games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - Regular Season

parameters.name: splitId
parameters.description:
Enter the stat split to be returned. (The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.)
  1. If omitted, only official total stats (splitId = -1) will be returned.
  2. If 'all', all the splits are returned.
  3. Otherwise, the entered split is returned.
  Default - Official totals (splitId = -1)

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
Filters results to only include optical player stats from this team in the given event. 
 Default - Unused, no team filtering will occur.

parameters.name: fitness
parameters.description:
Returns fitness analytic information for the given player. 
  Default - false, fitness data will not be returned

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of player names, team names, and venues. Not all languages available for every name. 
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: This is used when a player is on more than one tea...

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: To get statistics for the player above on one team only, enter team ID.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Statistics for games in the specified eventType only.
  Default - Regular Season

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get data for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like CBK 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: statsFrom
parameters.description:
This parameter allows you to further breakdown optical player stats by season totals (FULL), season totals by all team stints (ALL), and season totals for one or more stints on the same team (TEAM). Please note: the statsFrom=TEAM value also requires you to supply the 'teamId' parameter with a value. 
  Default - FULL, season totals will be returned.

parameters.name: fitness
parameters.description:
Returns fitness analytic information for the given player. 
  Default - false, fitness data will not be returned

parameters.name: passBreakdown
parameters.description:
Returns passing statistics, broken down by player, for the given team. 
  Default - false, pass breakdown stats will not be returned

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & player names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json
